summary: A market is a place where people go to buy or sell things.
full_text:
A market, or marketplace, is regular gathering of people for the purchase and sale of provisions, livestock, and other goods. A place where buying and selling occurs. In different parts of the world they may be referred to as a souk , bazaar , a fixed mercado  or itinerant tianguis , or palengke . Some markets operate on most days; others may be held weekly, or on less frequent specified days.
^ "Oxford Dictionary". Oxford Dictionaries.
title: Market place
